alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 7:32AM MDT until October 14 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Rapid City SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... White River near Kadoka affecting Jackson County. For the White River...including Kadoka...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Kadoka. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Some inundation of structures and roads near the White River are possible. Significant flooding of agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM MDT Friday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon, and then to 16.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon, then to 6.0 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM MDT.
